alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 9:16PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Shoshone County through 845 PM PDT... At 816 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mullan, or near Wallace, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Osburn, Wallace, and Mullan. This includes Interstate 90 in Idaho between mile markers 55 and 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
